agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: House Administration TIME & DATE: 9:30 AM, Tuesday, January 29, 2019 PLACE: E1.010 CHAIR: Rep. Charlie Geren The committee will hold an organizational hearing and adopt House Committee budgets. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
